create.activated: jsoncommands - Create plugin has been Activated.
create.deactivated: jsoncommands - Create plugin has been Activated.

edit.no_command: {command} doesn't exist or is a pre-installed command

delete.no_command: {command} doesn't exist or is a pre-installed command

jsoncommands.no_command: {command} doesn't exist or is a pre-installed command
jsoncommands.errorEditing: You didn't specify what you'd like to edit the command to.

adding.error_user: Please @ a user to give them points. ex: !add @user 1000
adding.success: {user} has added {ammount} points to {receiver} balance. They now have: {points} points

give.insufficient_funds: {user} you do not have enough points to give away. Please do !points to see your current points.
give.negative: You cannot give a user negative points.
give.error_user: Please @ a user to give them points. ex: !give @user 1000

bot.findme: @{user} Hey!, you can find me on https://github.com/Bioblaze/TrovoBot
bot.questions: @{user} If you would like to meet me in person or have other questions, feel free to contact us at https://discord.gg/Kc7fyx2
bot.wiki: @{user} Read our commands Wiki for more information on what they do at https://github.com/Bioblaze/TrovoBot/wiki/Default-Commands
bot.consolecommand: This bot was created by Bioblaze Payne
bot.consolecommanddesc: Tells you information about the Bot itself.

casino.message: Welcome to the casino, check out our games: Blackjack, dice, slots & wheel.

blackjack.dealerfinishdraw: The dealer has finished drawing cards and his hand contains: {dealerHandString}(Total: {dealerTotalH})
blackjack.dealer_bust: Dealer's hand passed 21. You won {playerBetH} Points.
blackjack.instructions: Please use '!blackjack stand' to keep your hand as is or '!blackjack hit' to be dealt an additional card.
blackjack.draw: The results are equal. You got your points back.
blackjack.no_points: You don't have enough points to play.
blackjack.progress: Please finish the game you started first.
blackjack.banned: We are sorry, you have been banned from our casino.

dice.banned: We are sorry, you have been banned from our casino. @{user}
dice.balance: You don't have enough points to play. @{user}
dice.min_bet: Please enter a valid bet amount. Minimum amount is 20 points. @{user}
dice.draw: The results are equal. You got your points back. @{user}

gamble.error_bet: Please enter a valid number or all.
gamble.banned: We are sorry, you have been banned from our casino. @{user}
gamble.balance: You don't have enough points to gamble. @{user}
gamble.min_bet: Please enter a valid gamble amount. Minimum amount is 100 points. @{user}

slots.banned: We are sorry, you have been banned from our casino. @{user}
slots.balance: You don't have enough points to play. @{user}
slots.min_bet: Please enter a valid bet amount. Minimum amount is 100 points. @{user}

wheel.banned: We are sorry, you have been banned from our casino. @{user}
wheel.balance: You don't have enough points to play. @{user}
wheel.min_bet: Please enter a valid bet amount. Minimum amount is 100 points. @{user}
wheel.spun: The wheel has been spun and it points ${wheel}. @{user}

gamep.incorrect: @{user} incorrect argument user must use 'pick' to initiate game randomizer

hydrate.start: Great, I will make sure the streamer stays hydrated! ðŸ’§
hydrate.interval: Streamer, I recommend you drink some water! I will remind you again in 30 minutes

shoutout.mentionuser: Check out {mention} at https://trovo.live/{user} - They are an awesome streamer and deserve some community love!
shoutout.mentionaccount: Check out {account} at https://trovo.live/{account} - They are an awesome streamer and deserve some community love!
shoutout.raid: This is a raid. Go to the channel of @{raidedChannel} now. --> https://trovo.live/{raidedChannel}

say.nomessage: You have to put a message.

poll.permissions: You don't have permission to do that!
poll.startFailed: The start failed, please try again
poll.somethingsWrong: Something went wrong try again or contact the Streamer or the Mods
poll.itemNotInList: {item} is not in the Votelist. Type: !poll getList to see a list of items to vote for
poll.sameValues: Vote items can't be the same Values poll will be reseted
poll.voteReseted: The vote has stopped and the List was cleared!

warzone.info: @{user} Here are my Warzone Stats: Kills: {kills} Deaths: {deaths}K/D Ratio: {kdr}Wins: {wins} Top 5 Placements: {top5} Top 10 Placements: {top10} I played {totma} rounds On average I live for: {avgLife} I am currently level {level}

discordrpc.clearerr:

Error: {error}
discordrpc.streamstopped: Stream has stopped, Clearing the Discord RPC Activity.
discordrpc.seterr:
Issue setting the Activity in Discord RPC.
Error: {error}
